notes: Nelphl's terminal observation. First documented case of observer integration. Her progression from curiosity through obsession to dissolution becomes paradigmatic. Rescued once by Bincher before final event.

Esseny Moll's terminal observation. Second documented integration. Unlike Nelphl (pulled against will), Moll appeared to accept invitation. Her case becomes key evidence for Dren's performativity hypothesis.

Pemlik Tross dies in Year 851, the same year as Vornis Keth. Neither knew the other's work. Both would remain forgotten for nearly eighty years. His private journal's final entry captures his conviction that the constellation revealed rather than constructed truth.

circumstances: Truck jumped to defend Boss from attacking creature
notes: During a deep cave expedition, the Redmane Expedition encounters a Maw Beast. Truck leaps to protect the Boss but is killed, his face completely destroyed by the creature. Ox drags his body from the cave. This incident marks the beginning of the Redmane disaster.

Grigsu Haldo dies in Year 891 after returning from the Yeller Quarry expedition. His 'massive frame, thick chest, beard' made him a physical presence. His final days: 'growling and cursing at neighbors.' His death left a vacuum that rivals rushed to fill.
